Founder

PrintStyle is founded by Mr. Anil Kumar in the 2004, New Delhi India. Our team had a drive to learn from their mistakes, improve their team unity, and progress to achieve the impossible. Through our experience from 15+ years, we have built a multitude of connections related to various aspects of the industry, developed a vast platform for communication and branding, and understood the actions necessary to succeed. PrintStyle: one company, with one goal, with one passion.

Check out PrintStyle podcast here!

OUR WORKAREA

Manufacturing

Our company manufactures fully functional footwear products, which are researched properly to provide the comforts at your feet.

Printing

Our professional team members can perform different types of printing techniques on different products accordingly, whether waterproof or modern printing techniques.

Embossing

Our embossing machinery are classified into various types which can be used to perform further process involved in the manufaturing of different products.

Stitching

The sewing machines come in many types: post, long arm, short arm, etc. The stitching line will have hundreds of these machines, the amount depending on the complexity of the shoe design.

THE AIM

  • 100+ Products
  • 40+ Clients
  • 15+ Years Experience

Our Company consists of several internal teams made up of professionals. In this vastly competitive industry, our company focuses on quality of products. However, the complexity of what we do reaches beyond mere engineering and into fields of business/marketing, graphic design, and possibly most importantly if considering real-world application, team management and cooperation. Then, each of these skill sets developed throughout the years is put to the test at regional, national, and world. As a result, PrintStyle has created a system which effectively develops and enhances students’ learning experience through their interests as well as by teaching necessary real-world situations/applications.
